name: The born of hope
description: every human being lives with many big hopes, ideals and best hopes from parents, hope is a manifestation and choice in the journey of life this painting talks about establishing new relationships full of humor, growing love and togetherness, seeing beauty in simplicity, productive behavior and creative explosions and the birth of crazy ideas, depicted by one character with an open mouth who is passionate with bright colors like youth energy and continues to be passed on to the next generation, makes a big change in each generation and life goes on.
